Event.name: triggerChoices
Event.desc: Triggers the setting/engaging of button/checkbox clicked, passes to appropriate port

Event.name: triggerCommunityFrontPageChoices
Event.desc: Triggers the setting/engaging of buttons clicked in the Community frontpage panel

Event.name: triggerCommunityItemChoices
Event.desc: Triggers the setting/engaging of buttons clicked in the Community item giving panel

Event.name: setvehicle
Event.desc: Triggers the spawning of the vehicle chosen in the setVehicle event.

Event.name: spawnPlatformCar
Event.desc: Spawns the Car Platform

Event.name: randomizePartsCar
Event.desc: Randomizes all slots

Event.name: changeBumper
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the bumper

Event.name: changeGrill
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the grill

Event.name: changeHood
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the hood

Event.name: changeWindshield
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the front windshield

Event.name: changeRoof
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the roof

Event.name: changeWindshieldRear
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the rear windshield

Event.name: changeTrunk
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the trunk

Event.name: changeBumperRear
Event.desc: Changes part dynamically for the rear bumper

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc1
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc2
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc3
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc4
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc5
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc6
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc7
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc8
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc9
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: setBeamMeUpLoc10
Event.desc: Does it!

Event.name: beammeup_car
Event.desc: Sends call to engine just like pressing 6. Triggers teleport to last vehicle. Lamentably, no peanuts on the flight.

Event.name: readythebeamscotty_self1
Event.desc: Sends call to grasp your chosen coordinates tightly in its pocket for lunch.

Event.name: beammeup_self1
Event.desc: Scotty turns you into pure light and returns you to the ship, he keeps your pocket change as a tip.

Event.name: readythebeamscotty_self2
Event.desc: Sends call to grasp your chosen coordinates tightly in its pocket for lunch.

Event.name: beammeup_self2
Event.desc: Scotty turns you into pure light and returns you to the ship, he keeps your pocket change as a tip.

Event.name: f_lock_saveposition1
Event.desc: At control panel 1, Scotty holds a lightswitch rave and locks it up, unable to save new coordinates til it's unclocked, captain!

Event.name: f_lock_saveposition2
Event.desc: At control panel 2, Scotty holds a lightswitch rave and locks it up, unable to save new coordinates til it's unclocked, captain!

Function.name: setChoices
Function.desc: Grabs button/checkbox input and sets the choice for which setting you want to enable/disable

param.name: varID
param.desc: Grabs button/checkbox input and sets the choice for which setting you want to enable/disable

Function.name: setCommunityFrontPageChoices
Function.desc: Switch case spectrum for choices being pulled from Community panel

param.name: varID
param.desc: Switch case spectrum for choices being pulled from Community frontpage panel

Function.name: setCommunityItemChoices
Function.desc: Switch case spectrum for choices being pulled from Community panel

param.name: varID
param.desc: Switch case spectrum for choices being pulled from Community item giving panel

Function.name: spawnVehicle
Function.desc: Var passed from GUI, grabs button input and selects the vehicle corresponding to button.

param.name: vehicleChoice
param.desc: Var passed from GUI, grabs button input and selects the vehicle corresponding to button.
